pullrequest.title: Gazebo models of harbour entities - 20 and 40 feet containers

content.raw: @iche033 , on Gazebo 8.1.1 when I click on a container Gazebo crashes with `[Err] [Mesh.cc:560] EXCEPTION: Index too large`. There must be something weird on the collada files, but I think in any case Gazebo shouldn't crash. Is the same happening to you?
content.html: @iche033 , on Gazebo 8.1.1 when I click on a container Gazebo crashes with [Err] [Mesh.cc:560] EXCEPTION: Index too large. There must be something weird on the collada files, but I think in any case Gazebo shouldn't crash. Is the same happening to you?
